welcome_message_body: Welcome to Longueuil, Canada! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Longueuil has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: El Paisa de Longueuil
restaurants.description: El Paisa de Longueuil is a mexican restaurant located in Longueuil.
restaurants.address: 1079, Boulevard Curé-Poirier O (Rue St-Georges), Longueuil QC

restaurants.name: L'oeuf Cochon
restaurants.description: L'oeuf Cochon is a breakfast spot located in Longueuil.
restaurants.address: 1930, ch. de Chambly (Curé Poirier), Longueuil QC J4J 3Y2

restaurants.name: Bistro des Bières Belges
restaurants.description: Bistro des Bières Belges is a belgian restaurant located in Saint-Hubert.
restaurants.address: 2088 rue Montcalm (boul. Taschereau), Saint-Hubert QC J4T 2E2

restaurants.name: Jacques Cartier Pizza
restaurants.description: Jacques Cartier Pizza is a pizzeria located in Longueuil.
restaurants.address: 1085 Cure-Poirier Blvd O (Rue Saint-Jean), Longueuil QC J4K 2E6

restaurants.name: Twisted Burger
restaurants.description: Twisted Burger is a burger joint located in LeMoyne.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
